channel.title: Tommy Dorfman on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tommy Dorfman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ava Phillippe, Sam Morelos Cast in Tommy Dorfman’s ‘Laura Dean Keeps Breaking Up With Me’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The feature film adaptation of Mariko Tamaki’s best-selling graphic novel, from Dorfman’s recently-launched Good Girl Productions, has found its Laura Dean and Freddie Riley.
